thread.title: Victor Garber Ties the Knot With Artist Rainer Andreesen in Canada
thread.title_full: Victor Garber Ties the Knot With Artist Rainer Andreesen in Canada

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Victor Garber Ties the Knot With Artist Rainer Andreesen in Canada
text:
Comments Victor's longtime partner Rainer captions a snap of them laughing together in black suits, 'YES WE DID!' and puts the hashtags 'just got married,' 'canada' and 'after 16 years.' 
Victor Garber and his longtime partner Rainer Andreesen are officially married. The artist took to Instagram over the weekend to share the exciting-yet-surprising news with a sweet snap of them laughing together. The newlyweds looked well-grommed in the said snap. Victor put his arm around Rainer's hip while the artist put his hand on the actor's shoulder. The " Titanic " actor wore black ensembles, showing his elegance, for the occasion. Rainer, meanwhile, opted for a white shirt and gray striped tie topped with black suit. Foto kiriman Rainer Andreesen (@rainerarts) pada Okt 10, 2015 pada 7:42 PDT Victor and Rainer tied the knot after 16 years of relationship. Both of them gave little information about their wedding. Based on the caption of the snap, the two were married in Canada. A caption for the snap read, "YES WE DID!" alongside the hashtags #justgotmarried #elopedintofino #canada @therealvictorgarber #after16years. Days after Rainer's post, the 66-year-old actor posted on his Instagram page a photo of them during the nuptials. In the said photo, the two were all smiles in front of a supposed lady who officiated their wedding. "Wickaninnish Inn Tofino BC magical place to tie the knot. @rainerarts," read the caption. Foto kiriman Victor Garber (@therealvictorgarber) pada Okt 12, 2015 pada 1:12 PDT The newlyweds received congratulatory messages from their fellow celebrities. Andy Cohen wrote, "OH MY GOD!!! Much love to you both Mazels all around! Kiss Vic for me!!!" Similarly, Rosie O'Donnell said, "Congrats to u 2 talented handsome men !!!!" Actor Greg Rikaart wrote, "HUGE congrats, @rainearts @therealvictorgarber."
